pr_title: RM#26227: add account filter to summary and gross report

timeline.message: RM#26227: add account filter to summary and gross report

timeline.bodyText: Please, apply the same query like done on other report. We should be able to select the account 20100, or 20, or 2 and filter on children accounts
timeline.author: gdu-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -511,6 +512,7 @@ WHERE
    AND (AccountingReport.date_to IS NULL OR Asset.acquisition_date <= AccountingReport.date_to)
    AND Asset.company = AccountingReport.company
    AND (AccountingReport.analytic_distribution_template IS NULL OR Asset.analytic_distribution_template = AccountingReport.analytic_distribution_template)
+   AND(AccountSet.account_set IS NULL OR AccountSet.account_set = Account.id)

replies.bodyText: will be done in next PR
replies.author: ale-axelor
